channel.title: ---Need Help With Something---
channel.description:
Hey i need help adding one small thing.
I want to be able to add a Skill Cape Master..Any npc..That when you have a 99 of a skill..He gives you the Cape and The hood...Please help me how to add that...I will Rep++...Thanks A lot..
---King---

item.title: ---Need Help With Something---
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Theres an easier way. Find the switches and cases related to npcs, and put the chosen NPCs ID as the case and get it to check what skill is lvl 99, or 135, and give out the cape accordingly.

Read full topic

item.title: ---Need Help With Something---
item.dc:creator: @Owner_King Owner King
item.description:
@Owner_King wrote:

Oh i see…But look i know how to add npcs…i know how to make them talk…but how do i make it so that when someone has a 99 ina skill that npc will give them skill cape they deserve (and hood too)

Read full topic

item.title: ---Need Help With Something---
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

[quote=“Owner King, post:1, topic:227623”]Hey i need help adding one small thing.

I want to be able to add a Skill Cape Master…Any npc…That when you have a 99 of a skill…He gives you the Cape and The hood…Please help me how to add that…I will Rep++…Thanks A lot…

—King—[/quote]

Well, one, you can’t rep, you must have a minimum of 15 rep to be able to rep other players and, I’ll help you out some, here’s the basics you should know, first, you have to add an Npc into Autospawn.cfg, then, if you want him to give things to your players, you have to add that as a case in client.java, along with if you want him to talk, you add that also in client.java under Npcchatupdate {

Read full topic
